attributes.action: recognise the sovereignty of the Empire of Austenasia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Empire of Austenasia was founded on 20 September 2008 and is situated south-west of London, surrounded by the borough of Sutton. Austenasia is ruled by HIM Emperor Terry I and run by the Austenasian Prime Minister, HIH Crown Prince Jonathan.
Under the Montevideo Convention, Austenasia is a sovereign state, and we the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to recognise it as such.
attributes.creator_name: The Much Hon. Jonathan Austen of Glencrannog (aka HIH Crown Prince Jonathan)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
